page_content: The page provides information and resources for job seekers, including an E-Learning portal for tips and background information.
The page outlines the legal foundations for vocational training, including rules on absences, work permits, and employment conditions.
The page provides information on rewards for good academic performance, probation periods, and process units in vocational training.
The page offers various PDF forms and guides related to tax declarations for the year 2018.
The page discusses the management of digital documents within government agencies, including guidelines for introducing new software and long-term archiving.
The page provides information on how to use the eTax Solothurn application for online tax filing, including technical support details.
The page outlines the procedures for reporting sickness absences, including the use of an electronic form for extended absences.
